The Challenge Network
Challenge with Distinction Graduation 2013
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You have been invited to this event because you've reached Challenge with Distinction. You Graduated in 2012 and went on to achieve an additional 48 hours of volunteering through; volunteering in your communities, attending TCS events, becoming Associate Mentors, being Youth Board Member. Well done.
We would you you to join us and at this year's ceremony to collect your Challenge with Distinction certificate:
When: Saturday 12th October at 3.15pm Where: Wolverhampton Civic Hall What do I wear: Smart
Please make sure you RSVP to zara.losch@the-challenge.org if you are collecting your certificate in person.
Those who can't attend can have their certificates posted to them.
Yours sincerely
The Black Country Team
